text: During #HolyWeek2021 doses of the Pfizer-BioNTech #vaccine purchased by the Holy See and offered by the  @INMISpallanzani through the Vatican #COVID19 Commission, will be used to vaccinate 1,200 of the poorest and most marginalised people. https://t.co/nwnajsPTYz @VaticanIHD https://t.co/74XNdQJXBp
